name: Disabled
description:
A manufactured robot that has rebooted, wakes to find a desolate factory. Recollecting the memories as a maintenance robot, but thinking it’s human? One thing is certain, by climbing up the factory, it would regain memories of its identity.

Disabled is a 2D platformer puzzle game that plays as a robot wanting to know the memories locked away. By progressing the levels it would slowly reveal its memories unlocking as human. 

Enjoy the world of post-apocalyptic pixel art of a factory that has been abandoned.

Features -

Solve your way out by interacting with the level designs

Rooms interconnecting to problem solve

Four levels to play with (in-development)

Release date -

0.1 Disabled Alpha 

 As the game is still in development, let me know  on what could be furthered improved.

Happy Playing!

Bio -

Hi I'm Johann Fajardo and from New Zealand started being a game developer in hope to earn a career from it. I've been doing small scale projects to improve my skills and get feedbacks from people to see what I could improve at. So letting your feedback known in the comments would be greatly appreciated.
